name: notifiarr
description: Notifiarr integrates self-hosted media systems like Plex, Radarr, and Sonarr with alerts, stats, and automation. It sends user notifications and status updates across devices via a configurable UI.
features: Media server integration: Connect Plex, Radarr, Sonarr, Lidarr, and other *arr applications.
Discord notifications: Send alerts and updates to Discord channels with rich embeds.
Custom triggers: Configure notifications for downloads, upgrades, health checks, and more.
Statistics dashboard: View media library stats, activity, and system health in one place.
Remote control: Manage media applications remotely through Discord bot commands.
Health monitoring: Track application status and receive alerts when services go down.
Request management: Handle media requests from users with approval workflows.
Calendar integration: View upcoming releases and scheduled downloads in calendar format.
Multi-server support: Monitor and manage multiple media servers from a single instance.
Custom reactions: Set up automated actions in response to media server events.
User notifications: Alert users when their requested content becomes available.
Activity logs: Track all notifications and actions for troubleshooting and auditing.
